system.availability: [Addictive] Lasts 4d10 minutes. Renders the user into a near-death state, any tests to determine the user's status suffer -30, with failiure indicating the user is dead. Good Craftsmanship allows user to specify how long the state lasts, up to an hour. Poor Craftsmanship only applies a -10 to tests to determine whether the user is alive.
system.cost: Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.
